Methods in com.aliyun.odps.graph that return types with arguments of type Edge
 List<Edge<I,E>> VertexChanges.getAddedEdgeList()

 List<Edge<I,E>> Vertex.getEdges()
          获取以此点为起始的边集，调用该方法前，建议调用Vertex.hasEdges() 确定此点是否存在出边.
 List<Edge<I,E>> Vertex.removeEdges(I destVertexId)
          给定终点，删除对应边，如果有多个相同终点的重复边，也一并会被删除.
